short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dodge the neon squares to get more points! Try not to be hit, or you'll have to start over!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can use the arrow keys to move. This can provide entertainment anywhere, anytime, as long as you have a computer!
